text: Wilhelm Altmann (1905) Wilhelm Altmann (4 April 1862 – 25 March 1951) was a German historian and musicologist. Altmann was born in Adelnau (Odolanów), Province of Posen, and died in Hildesheim. Wilhelm Altmann and his wife Marie née Louis are buried in Hildesheim, Peiner Straße on the cemetery Nordfriedhof (Zentralfriedhof). The couple had three children: Ulrich (1889-1950), Ursula and Berthold (1896-1992). ==Literary works== * Tonkünstlerlexikon, 121926 * Kammermusikliteratur, 51931 Category:1862 births Category:1951 deaths Category:People from Odolanów Category:German music historians Category:German musicologists Category:People from the Province of Posen Category:German male non-fiction writers
title: Wilhelm Altmann
